name.de: BardonChatGPT - Chatten Sie mit BARD auf Google

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Chat with BARD from ChatGPT Website
short.de: Chatten Sie mit BARD bei allen ChatGPT-Suchanfragen.
short.es: Chatea con BARD en todas las búsquedas de chatGPT.
short.fr: Discutez avec BARD sur toutes les recherches ChatGPT.
short.he: צ'אט עם BARD בכל חיפושי ChatGPT
short.pt_PT: Bate-papo com BARD em todas as pesquisas do ChatGPT.
short.ro: Chat cu BARD pe toate căutările pe ChatGPT.
short.ru: Общайтесь с BARD во всех поисковых запросах ChatGPT.
short.uk: Спілкуйтеся з BARD у всіх пошукових запитах ChatGPT.
short.zh_CN: 在所有谷歌搜索中与 BARD 聊天。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Integrates BARD chat inside your ChatGPT website. It also allows you to continue the chat with BARD in same thread just like you would do if you had been chatting using BARD's website.

It gives Power of ChatGPT Plugins to Free ChatGPT users just like ChatGPT Plus users, but for FREE!

Note: The BARD panel appears on right side only after initiating conversation with ChatGPT. No button to be clicked to launch it, just start conversing with chatGPT,  Bard will start replying too.

For any suggestions check out our website(github). Feel free to create a ticket or send a pull request if you need any changes.


LEGAL:
Disclaimer: BardonChatGPT is not official ChatGPT™ or BARD™ application. It is an unofficial extension that is developed and maintained independently  and has no affiliation to Google or OpenAI .
long.de,es,fr,he,hu,ko,pt_PT,ro,ru,uk,zh_CN: Integrates BARD chat inside your ChatGPT website. It also allows you to continue the chat with BARD in same thread just like you would if you had been chatting using BARD's website. For any suggestions check out our website(github). Feel free to create a ticket or send a pull request if you need any changes.
